S.FORM: = Eritrea = Gaga kska Meycow ka Eritrea, 15 00 N, 39 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 117,600 sq km(hangan na o Tg101)(knlbanga dxgal o 101,000 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 16,600 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 5,869,869 hiyi. Gaga Asmara ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 24 idas 5 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Eritrea ga wada sugan 75.10% ka dxgal qpahan, 15.10% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 9.80% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Isaias Afwerki, pnaah hngkawas1993 idas 5 jiyax 24pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Rikisi Pusu tyawmu: Rikisi Oricuyya Mwaya bay han pa tunkuncyu pnhiyu Isopiya ka Oricuyya, nyahan knnrmux Itari ka kngkawas 1890, wada mdxral qnlhangan Itari, babaw mntudha mnccbu knlangan babaw dxral daw; spuda snrwanan Ryeynhoko, msupu Isopiya phiyu Isopiya mi Pricuyya ryeynpang. Kngkawas 1962 cida wada kyapan Isopiya da mi, wada mtu14 sng koka Isopiya. Oricuyya cyeyhwang cnsyeyn ka pnhiyu kngkawas 1960, spuda biyax mtdiyal smatang ptalax Isopiya ka Oricuyya. "Oricuyya jnmin cyeyhwang cnsyeyn" pa mniq kkngkawas 1970 mniq dnudul Isayasu Ahuywoarci ptalax kndadax "Oricuyya cyeyhwang cnsyeyn", kndudul rmirih Oricuyya cyeyhwang cnsyeyn dmi; wada mpusu bay heytay knciyuk Oricuyya ckcka Isopiya. Mniq kngkawas 1991 wada spoxan ka Isopiya Mnkosutu cngcweyn da u, smruwa mniq Oricuyya muda kongmin topyaw ka Meyraysu Conawey burah seyhu, spuda so niyi muda muru ndanan ka pptalax Isopiya. Kngkawas 1993 idas 4 cida wada balay bay spuda dndulan mi knlawa Ryeynhoko mi muda kongmin topyaw, hiti balay daw wada dhuq 99.8% ka meytaq smruwa ptalax Isopiya, kngkawas cida idas 5 diyax 24 ka pusa kari dukuricu. Kngkawas 2018 idas 7, Isopiya mi Oricuyya u wada malix pnluban dha pspayis, congri Isopiya Api Ayhamayto Ari thiti dungan u musa qmita Oricuyya mi psdhu ppbatas hoping tyawyey. Ddha koka congri mi Yeynso ka muda pusa kari prading ppwaluk mawyi mi keyjay mi waycyaw dungan. Tiri Wa mniq Tuiril Ahuyrika mi tudaya balay urung Ahuyrika, lmutuc ucilung Tanah ka ratuc tuhunac. Mtsiyaw Isopiya ka tuhunac na, msdalih Sutan ka tuiril, tunarac hunac ka msqapah Ciputi, tunarac daya u msuiyax ucilung Tanah mssipaw Yeymun mi Sauti Arapo. Hayanseyng(kiya ka knkana Tahorako cyuntaw 355 tawyu) knbbaraw 1350 kongri. Kana dxral koka pa niqan sanbung ici ka congyang kawyeyn, haypa 1800 meyta dhuq 3000 meyta; tuiril u ttiping kobu, tunarac u mstucilung brnux. Kana koka knbaraw bay duwiyaq pa Amba Soira tuckcka mbrnux lmiqu, haypa 3013 meyta, turbuq bay u dxral turbuq Kobar tunarac brnux, rmabang knrbuq mbabaw ucilung 75 meyta, wana yayung Setit ka yayung hmuru ini kdngu, knbrawan u 180 kngri, knbeyhing bay yayung knkarac ka yayung Mareybu；htngay bay cida u beytaq 440 kongri knhbbaraw. Nniqan mbrnux lmiqu u karac knmalu bay nniqan sediq, pdkanan kngkawas ka kntlxan karac u 17°, bbuyan quyux u 525 hawmi. 12 idas dhuq 2 idas ka mskuy bay psdkanan karac, kiya mi 15℃ knskuy, 5 idas dhuq 6 idas ka kntlxan bay pndkanan karac, kiya mi 25℃ kntlxan; 4 idas dhuq 5 idas ka tnkarac qmuyux tiping, 6 idas dhuq 8 idas ka tnkarac qmuyux beyhing, msngari da u tnkarac kndnguwan. Tunarac mi tuiril tudxral mtilux mdngu, quri so kngkawas pndkanan kntlxan u 30℃ mi 28℃, kngkawas pndkanan hnbuyan quyux u ini qndhuq 400 hawmi. Ucilung tanah mssiyaw ucilung bnaqi knbbuyu, iyax 3 idas dhuq 10 idas u, kntlxan diyan wa dhuq hmrinas 40℃ kntlxan. Seyji Pnhyuwan koka dhuq saya, jnmin mincu mi cngyi cnsyeyn u ida pskingal bay Oricuyya ka skngalan dha taxa bay cngtang. Ana so wada dmuwi knou tang ka keyngpo kngkawas 1997 cida, binaw ida hmtur phiyu quri pnsliyan seyji icil ka seyhu Oricuyya. Kngkawas 1998 dhuq kngkawas 2000, Oricuyya mi Isopiya u mnniq ayus dha mnccbu. Kngkawas 2000 cida sndhu ppatas ppsblayaq ka ddha koka niyi. Kngkawas 2001 dmka kngkawas brah, wada pusa kari cawan "waya seyngkyo" mi "waya pnsliyan cngtang" ka Oricuyya, smatang muda beyhing seyngkyo hiti kngkawas, kndudul muda waya ou tang. Binaw wada snturung beyhing bay mtdiyal kari quri seyji ka ckcka tang dha nanaq, uka brahan mndungus ka seyngkyo. Kngkawas 2002, muda pusa kari quri "waya seyngkyo" ka Oricuyya, ptura bay rmngaw "ou tang u ini pndungus Oricuyya saya". Kngkawas iyax niyi, soto Isayasu u snbeyhing qmita sndhu cngcweyn mi qqlahang snbliqan koka ka pusu bay qqpahun na, pkrana biyax tangcngcyun tnualang, tqlahang qnpringan kmciyuk ka ccka koka mi nganguc, kiya mi smatang muda pkmalu sediq "pusu sngtangan", muda mdhu qnqbliqan cngcyu. Kokomin yikay u phiyu 150 knhbrawan hiyi ging, kiya ka kana jnmin mincu mi cngyi cnsyeyn congyang weyyeyn 75 hiyi, smalu keynpo gikay 60 hiyi mi Oricuyya ryuway cyawpaw dayhyo 15 hiyi, ckcka u 22% ka ging qridin. Gicyo u kndadax kana ging seyngkyo pnhiyu, mntxan 5 kngkawas, saya han u soto Isayasu ka rmilih han. Seykining kokomin gikay u smmalu waya koka, smruwa yoswan mi seyngkyo bukung koka. Kngkawas 1993 dhuq kngkawas 2000 kokomin gikay u mn13 muda mssli taykay, hiti da u knttu msangay ini uda kaygi. Kngkawas 1997 idas 1 dhuq idas 3, Oricuyya u mnuda tumntxan sngci gikay seyngkyo. Kngkawas 2004 idas 5 diyax 19, muda tumn3 snggikay seyngkyo. Kana koka u 93 knbkiyan knhbrawan ka pusa hangan mpseyngkyo, topyawryu 92.1%, kana balay pnhyuwan ging tnualang pa 346 hiyi, 30% ka qridin. Oricuyya tingcihuy cihwa muda mntxan seyngkyo kana koka, binaw ini bay mndungus knttu, ana beytaq saya uxay bay mnuda mntxan mndungus bay beyhing seyngkyo. Ckcka koka Oricuyya pa uka mtrawah kndusan, kiya mi kngkawas cuxal beytaq tumaxal kngkawas niyi u ida dmuwi ptkixan lmawa musa pcaping. Qnduriq na u wada dan qnburang qmraq mi shmuk mi ptraqil beytaq phqilun uri. Singcng cyuhwa Pusu tyawmu: Oricuyya singcng cyuhwa Oricuyya tnualang seyhu psnakan sng mi keyng mi go mi song sspac kluwanan. Kana koka u psnakan 6 ka sng. Asumara ka sotu. Knhbrawan hiyi Knhbrawan hiyi 690 knbkiyan(kngkawas 2012 kucicu), kndkilan ryu knhbrawan hiyi u ya bay 2.0%. Niqan 9 ka minjoku: Tikoreyniya(ya bay knhbrawan hiyi kana sediq 50%), Tkorey(31.4%), Ahwaar(5%), Sahwo(5%), Sitaraypo(2.5%), Pirun(2.1%), Kunama(2%), Nara(1.5%) mi Rasaita(0.5%). Txtaxa minjoku pa niqan nanaq kari dha, kana koka u pusu bay sduwi dha kari pa kari Tikoreyniya, binaw dmuwi kari Eygo uri mi kari Arapo. Snhiyan dha u pnrhulan Tonghwang Cngtong(pnrhulan Oricuyya Cngtong Taywasito) mi Isurankyo; ya bay pn40% knhbrawan kana, ini khbaraw ka snluhay Teysukyokay mi snhiyan dha rudan cbiyaw(thmuku ana manu kyo) Kari Saya pa niqan ou kluwanan kari ka ddiyun cka Oricuyya, to bay pniyah tukari Sanmito mi tukari Kusito. Mniq Oricuyya dduwi dha tukari San pa niqan kari Arapo mi kari Tkorey mi kari Tkoriniya mi hana mndan sndhu ka kari Dahlik, koka dha pa niqan hmrinas knhbrawan 80% ka sediq dmuwi kari dniyi(pusu bay u kari Tikorey mi kari Tikoriniya) ka tukingal kari. Kari Eygo mi kari Itari u niqan sediq dmuwi uri. Dduwi kongsu pusu bay sduwi dha u kari Tikoriniya mi kari Arapo. Kari Tikoriniya pa malu sduwi jiyi cicu matas. Keyjay Pusu tyawmu: Mntna knhbaraw bay koka Ahuyrika, pusu bay pnyahan keyjay pa sntama quri qpahun ppwalang. Ya bay 80％ knhbrawan sediq ka qmpah qpahun ppwalang mi pnluban quri qpahun niyi kana. Kana bay pusu muda smliq qpahun ppwalang ida nkiya pa quri qnrqilan kndnguwan. Babaw dukuricu daw, mbiyax bay pstutuy keyjay ka seyhu, smalu waya keyjay ntxtaxa ka pusu dmudul keyjay sucang pkrana canrwey, pusa kari curi kngsng, smmalu cicu sesu, mbiyax lmawa taykwan koka icil mi quri dnyawan uri, kiya mi dmudul cyawmin wayhuy. Pusa kari quri waya dxral pnrdingan mi thiti ka seyhu mi waya tocu mi waya cinjong mi waya swuyso mi waya quri lmlamu, mdrumuc dmudul swangpyeyn mi twopeyn keyjay mawyi cicu, kngkawas 1997 ka prading muda dmuwi pila koka nanaq. Kngkawas 2000 cida Oricuyya mi Isopiya msangay mccbu ka tnuayus ddha koka niyi daw, bsiyaq bay "ini ccbu mi ini psblayaq" ka ddha koka niyi, seyhu Oricuyya u muda prading "mccbu cida keyjay cngco". Kngkawas 2005 beytaq saya, serhu Oricuyya pa wada dha shmuk duma ka suing ciyey, shtur cingko ka suing ciyey, plixan ka wayhuy cuyo tweyhwan mi quri so uuda msupu mari msupu sbari, snbiyax wayhwey kwancu. Spuda snpuwan seyhu Oricuyya, kngkawas 1992 dhuq kngkawas 1997 ka knrana keyjay pndkanan u 7% dhuq 8%, kngkawas 1998 dhuq kngkawas 2010 knrana keyjay pndkanan u 2%. Spuda nengweyn mi knkrayan briyan ka uqun mi wada mlih uri ka pila dha, tonghwo pngcangryu cusu u iyax 9% dhuq 12%. Caycng ccu GDP ka piri u kndadax 8% mrana dhuq 19%. Kngkawas nduray niyi, seyhu Oricuyya u mbiyax bay dmudul kwangyey mi qpahun tnpqcurux mi qpahun tnprmiwaw, pkrana puman smmalu quri nongyey cicu sosu, kndudul pskbiyax quri ppdayaw cingmaw koka. Kngkawas 2009 ckcka koka Oricuyya nngalan kana hbangan u 18.7 oku pila Amirika, knrana kana kngkawas u 3.6%. Wada mrana ka kwangyey cucan kayhwa, kngkawas 2011 idas 3, Oricuyya mi Kanada mnsupu psumu kayhwa turima knbeyhing kana knlangan babaw dxral ka king mi dong mi sin mi ging prmaxan kwangpi bnaqi king kwang tocan, tongkwang huseyncang u wada mndungus mnhdu smalu kngkawas 2013 idas 6, prading mangal tongkwang. Seyhu Oricuyya u mbiyax bay dmudul dmayaw pkrana tnualang mpqpah pnwalang, snblayaq qmlahang tbrinah tnpheytay, pkmalu quri kyoyiku mi spqita mnarux, pkrana smmalu cicu, so lmutuc knbaka nanaq keyjay syakay ka Oricuyya. Mccbu Isopiya tnuayus u, mnuda beyhing bay kntkuran na quri keyjay ka Oricuyya, kngkawas 1999 knrana GDP u wada mlih ini kndhuq 1%, dhuq kngkawas 2000 u wada beytaq mrana knsbukuy 8.2%. Mccbu pa wada song ka pila dha Oricuyya, beytaq 6 ou pila Amirika. Pusu bay kongyaku u niqan hwangcu, cuko, nocu capin cyakong, cinsu cyakong, ggomu cupin cyakong, jayryaw ssalu sapah. Kngkawas 2010 kana hbangan nngalan kongyaku u 2.263 ou pila amirika, kana koka u niqan ciyey knbeyhing knckcka u 255 sapah, quri so uuqun mi mmahun ciyey u 89 sapah, hwangcu, qqraqil, lukus ciyey u 34 sapah, smalu patas, iyingsacu 13 sapah, hwakong, pingki, ssmalu iyu u 24 sapah, uxay xxiluy qqiya ssalu sapah u 34 sapah, xxiluy cyakong u 18 sapah, cyacyurey qpahun u 31 sapah. Kisya: Hana balay elu kisya Oricuyya pa wana bay 306 kongri han, kndadax Asumara prading, tunarac u mquri Masawa, tuiril u dhuq Akotato, wada sliqun mniq mccbu cida, kiya ka wada plixun ini sduwi da. Kngkawas 1994 ka mniq Masawa wada smlun 5 kongri, prading tmalang dungan. Ppaun elu qsiya: Oricuyya pa niqan Masawa mi Asapu ddha beyhing trndu asu. Masawa u niqan 9 sanan trdu asu, pndkanan kngkawas twenturyang u 1.6 knbkiyan hwokuy, 83.5 knbkiyan hwou, malu msupu smku 2500 hwokuy, 12 knbkiyan twen hwou. Asapu kang u niqan 12 sanan trdu asu, malu skuwan 28116 hwokuy, 36 knbkiyan twen hwou. Kngkawas 1992 dhuq kngkawas 1996 iyax niyi u, Asapu kang pndkanan kngkawas twenturyang u 2.5 knbkiyan hwokuy, 203.9 knbkiyan twen hwou. Nbabaw mccbu tnuayus Isopiya daw, wada "mnhuqil trnduwan asu" ka Asapu, kawas kawas u wada song 4000 knbkiyan pila amirika. Masawa hwoyun ryang ka kndudul mrana. Seyhu Oricuyya u tocu 6.6 ou naykohwa plbangun smmalu ka Masawa trduwan asu, wada mnhdu smalu kngkawas 2002. Oricuyya u niqan tu3 sapah ka hangyun kojyo, niqan 7 ka beyhing hworwen. Ckcka niyi pa Oricuyya hangyun kojyo u niqan 4 hworwen, mquri trduwan asu Sutan mi Ayci mi Cita mi Yeymn mi Kata mi Tansangniya tmalang. Ppaun skoki: Oricuyya saya u niqan Oricuyya hangkong mi Nasayar hangkong ddha nkoka hangkong kojyo, niqan ka Ayci hangkong mi Tekwo Hansa hangkong mi Sutan hangkong mi Yeymn hangkong dspac hangkong kojyo koka icil ka mniq Oricuyya pkrana qqpahun dha. Oricuyya u niqan Asumara mi Asapu mi Masawa t3 ka kwoci cicang, niqan Tahorako mi Kurmud ddha elu krotang stalang kwoney cicang mi Tesseney mi Naykohwa mi Mahmimet mi Paruntu dspac elu uxay krotang stalang kwoney cicang. Oricuyya saya u niqan rrima ka skoki sapa okuyaku, ckcka niyi u turu ka poin, ddha ka kongcong basu.

= Eritrea = Gaga kska Meycow ka Eritrea, 15 00 N, 39 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 117,600 sq km(hangan na o Tg101)(knlbanga dxgal o 101,000 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 16,600 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 5,869,869 hiyi. Gaga Asmara ka poso alang paro, jiyax 24 idas 5 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Eritrea ga wada sogan 75.10% ka dxgal qpahan, 15.10% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 9.80% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Isaias Afwerki, pnaah hngkawas1993 idas 5 jiyax 24pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Rikisi Poso tyawmo: Rikisi Oricoyya Mwaya bay han pa tonkoncyo pnhiyo Isopiya ka Oricoyya, nyahan knnrmox Itari ka kngkawas 1890, wada mdxral qnlhangan Itari, babaw mntodha mnccbo knlangan babaw dxral daw; spoda snrwanan Ryeynhoko, msopo Isopiya phiyo Isopiya mi Pricoyya ryeynpang. Kngkawas 1962 cida wada kyapan Isopiya da mi, wada mto14 sng koka Isopiya. Oricoyya cyeyhwang cnsyeyn ka pnhiyo kngkawas 1960, spoda biyax mtdiyal smatang ptalax Isopiya ka Oricoyya. "Oricoyya jnmin cyeyhwang cnsyeyn" pa mniq kkngkawas 1970 mniq dnodol Isayaso Ahoywoarci ptalax kndadax "Oricoyya cyeyhwang cnsyeyn", kndodol rmirih Oricoyya cyeyhwang cnsyeyn dmi; wada mposo bay heytay knciyok Oricoyya ckcka Isopiya. Mniq kngkawas 1991 wada spoxan ka Isopiya Mnkosoto cngcweyn da o, smrowa mniq Oricoyya moda kongmin topyaw ka Meyrayso Conawey borah seyho, spoda so niyi moda moro ndanan ka pptalax Isopiya. Kngkawas 1993 idas 4 cida wada balay bay spoda dndolan mi knlawa Ryeynhoko mi moda kongmin topyaw, hiti balay daw wada dhoq 99.8% ka meytaq smrowa ptalax Isopiya, kngkawas cida idas 5 diyax 24 ka posa kari dokorico. Kngkawas 2018 idas 7, Isopiya mi Oricoyya o wada malix pnloban dha pspayis, congri Isopiya Api Ayhamayto Ari thiti dongan o mosa qmita Oricoyya mi psdho ppbatas hoping tyawyey. Ddha koka congri mi Yeynso ka moda posa kari prading ppwalok mawyi mi keyjay mi waycyaw dongan. Tiri Wa mniq Toiril Ahoyrika mi todaya balay orong Ahoyrika, lmotoc ocilong Tanah ka ratoc tohonac. Mtsiyaw Isopiya ka tohonac na, msdalih Sotan ka toiril, tonarac honac ka msqapah Cipoti, tonarac daya o msoiyax ocilong Tanah mssipaw Yeymon mi Saoti Arapo. Hayanseyng(kiya ka knkana Tahorako cyontaw 355 tawyo) knbbaraw 1350 kongri. Kana dxral koka pa niqan sanbong ici ka congyang kawyeyn, haypa 1800 meyta dhoq 3000 meyta; toiril o ttiping kobo, tonarac o mstocilong brnox. Kana koka knbaraw bay dowiyaq pa Amba Soira tockcka mbrnox lmiqo, haypa 3013 meyta, torboq bay o dxral torboq Kobar tonarac brnox, rmabang knrboq mbabaw ocilong 75 meyta, wana yayong Setit ka yayong hmoro ini kdngo, knbrawan o 180 kngri, knbeyhing bay yayong knkarac ka yayong Mareybo；htngay bay cida o beytaq 440 kongri knhbbaraw. Nniqan mbrnox lmiqo o karac knmalo bay nniqan sediq, pdkanan kngkawas ka kntlxan karac o 17°, bboyan qoyox o 525 hawmi. 12 idas dhoq 2 idas ka mskoy bay psdkanan karac, kiya mi 15℃ knskoy, 5 idas dhoq 6 idas ka kntlxan bay pndkanan karac, kiya mi 25℃ kntlxan; 4 idas dhoq 5 idas ka tnkarac qmoyox tiping, 6 idas dhoq 8 idas ka tnkarac qmoyox beyhing, msngari da o tnkarac kndngowan. Tonarac mi toiril todxral mtilox mdngo, qori so kngkawas pndkanan kntlxan o 30℃ mi 28℃, kngkawas pndkanan hnboyan qoyox o ini qndhoq 400 hawmi. Ucilong tanah mssiyaw ocilong bnaqi knbboyo, iyax 3 idas dhoq 10 idas o, kntlxan diyan wa dhoq hmrinas 40℃ kntlxan. Seyji Pnhyowan koka dhoq saya, jnmin minco mi cngyi cnsyeyn o ida pskingal bay Oricoyya ka skngalan dha taxa bay cngtang. Ana so wada dmowi knoo tang ka keyngpo kngkawas 1997 cida, binaw ida hmtor phiyo qori pnsliyan seyji icil ka seyho Oricoyya. Kngkawas 1998 dhoq kngkawas 2000, Oricoyya mi Isopiya o mnniq ayos dha mnccbo. Kngkawas 2000 cida sndho ppatas ppsblayaq ka ddha koka niyi. Kngkawas 2001 dmka kngkawas brah, wada posa kari cawan "waya seyngkyo" mi "waya pnsliyan cngtang" ka Oricoyya, smatang moda beyhing seyngkyo hiti kngkawas, kndodol moda waya oo tang. Binaw wada sntorong beyhing bay mtdiyal kari qori seyji ka ckcka tang dha nanaq, oka brahan mndongos ka seyngkyo. Kngkawas 2002, moda posa kari qori "waya seyngkyo" ka Oricoyya, ptora bay rmngaw "oo tang o ini pndongos Oricoyya saya". Kngkawas iyax niyi, soto Isayaso o snbeyhing qmita sndho cngcweyn mi qqlahang snbliqan koka ka poso bay qqpahon na, pkrana biyax tangcngcyon tnoalang, tqlahang qnpringan kmciyok ka ccka koka mi ngangoc, kiya mi smatang moda pkmalo sediq "poso sngtangan", moda mdho qnqbliqan cngcyo. Kokomin yikay o phiyo 150 knhbrawan hiyi ging, kiya ka kana jnmin minco mi cngyi cnsyeyn congyang weyyeyn 75 hiyi, smalo keynpo gikay 60 hiyi mi Oricoyya ryoway cyawpaw dayhyo 15 hiyi, ckcka o 22% ka ging qridin. Gicyo o kndadax kana ging seyngkyo pnhiyo, mntxan 5 kngkawas, saya han o soto Isayaso ka rmilih han. Seykining kokomin gikay o smmalo waya koka, smrowa yoswan mi seyngkyo bokong koka. Kngkawas 1993 dhoq kngkawas 2000 kokomin gikay o mn13 moda mssli taykay, hiti da o kntto msangay ini oda kaygi. Kngkawas 1997 idas 1 dhoq idas 3, Oricoyya o mnoda tomntxan sngci gikay seyngkyo. Kngkawas 2004 idas 5 diyax 19, moda tomn3 snggikay seyngkyo. Kana koka o 93 knbkiyan knhbrawan ka posa hangan mpseyngkyo, topyawryo 92.1%, kana balay pnhyowan ging tnoalang pa 346 hiyi, 30% ka qridin. Oricoyya tingcihoy cihwa moda mntxan seyngkyo kana koka, binaw ini bay mndongos kntto, ana beytaq saya oxay bay mnoda mntxan mndongos bay beyhing seyngkyo. Ckcka koka Oricoyya pa oka mtrawah kndosan, kiya mi kngkawas coxal beytaq tomaxal kngkawas niyi o ida dmowi ptkixan lmawa mosa pcaping. Qndoriq na o wada dan qnborang qmraq mi shmok mi ptraqil beytaq phqilon ori. Singcng cyohwa Poso tyawmo: Oricoyya singcng cyohwa Oricoyya tnoalang seyho psnakan sng mi keyng mi go mi song sspac klowanan. Kana koka o psnakan 6 ka sng. Asomara ka soto. Knhbrawan hiyi Knhbrawan hiyi 690 knbkiyan(kngkawas 2012 kocico), kndkilan ryo knhbrawan hiyi o ya bay 2.0%. Niqan 9 ka minjoko: Tikoreyniya(ya bay knhbrawan hiyi kana sediq 50%), Tkorey(31.4%), Ahwaar(5%), Sahwo(5%), Sitaraypo(2.5%), Piron(2.1%), Konama(2%), Nara(1.5%) mi Rasaita(0.5%). Txtaxa minjoko pa niqan nanaq kari dha, kana koka o poso bay sdowi dha kari pa kari Tikoreyniya, binaw dmowi kari Eygo ori mi kari Arapo. Snhiyan dha o pnrholan Tonghwang Cngtong(pnrholan Oricoyya Cngtong Taywasito) mi Isorankyo; ya bay pn40% knhbrawan kana, ini khbaraw ka snlohay Teysokyokay mi snhiyan dha rodan cbiyaw(thmoko ana mano kyo) Kari Saya pa niqan oo klowanan kari ka ddiyon cka Oricoyya, to bay pniyah tokari Sanmito mi tokari Kosito. Mniq Oricoyya ddowi dha tokari San pa niqan kari Arapo mi kari Tkorey mi kari Tkoriniya mi hana mndan sndho ka kari Dahlik, koka dha pa niqan hmrinas knhbrawan 80% ka sediq dmowi kari dniyi(poso bay o kari Tikorey mi kari Tikoriniya) ka tokingal kari. Kari Eygo mi kari Itari o niqan sediq dmowi ori. Ddowi kongso poso bay sdowi dha o kari Tikoriniya mi kari Arapo. Kari Tikoriniya pa malo sdowi jiyi cico matas. Keyjay Poso tyawmo: Mntna knhbaraw bay koka Ahoyrika, poso bay pnyahan keyjay pa sntama qori qpahon ppwalang. Ya bay 80％ knhbrawan sediq ka qmpah qpahon ppwalang mi pnloban qori qpahon niyi kana. Kana bay poso moda smliq qpahon ppwalang ida nkiya pa qori qnrqilan kndngowan. Babaw dokorico daw, mbiyax bay pstotoy keyjay ka seyho, smalo waya keyjay ntxtaxa ka poso dmodol keyjay socang pkrana canrwey, posa kari cori kngsng, smmalo cico seso, mbiyax lmawa taykwan koka icil mi qori dnyawan ori, kiya mi dmodol cyawmin wayhoy. Posa kari qori waya dxral pnrdingan mi thiti ka seyho mi waya toco mi waya cinjong mi waya swoyso mi waya qori lmlamo, mdromoc dmodol swangpyeyn mi twopeyn keyjay mawyi cico, kngkawas 1997 ka prading moda dmowi pila koka nanaq. Kngkawas 2000 cida Oricoyya mi Isopiya msangay mccbo ka tnoayos ddha koka niyi daw, bsiyaq bay "ini ccbo mi ini psblayaq" ka ddha koka niyi, seyho Oricoyya o moda prading "mccbo cida keyjay cngco". Kngkawas 2005 beytaq saya, serho Oricoyya pa wada dha shmok doma ka soing ciyey, shtor cingko ka soing ciyey, plixan ka wayhoy coyo tweyhwan mi qori so ooda msopo mari msopo sbari, snbiyax wayhwey kwanco. Spoda snpowan seyho Oricoyya, kngkawas 1992 dhoq kngkawas 1997 ka knrana keyjay pndkanan o 7% dhoq 8%, kngkawas 1998 dhoq kngkawas 2010 knrana keyjay pndkanan o 2%. Spoda nengweyn mi knkrayan briyan ka oqon mi wada mlih ori ka pila dha, tonghwo pngcangryo coso o iyax 9% dhoq 12%. Caycng cco GDP ka piri o kndadax 8% mrana dhoq 19%. Kngkawas ndoray niyi, seyho Oricoyya o mbiyax bay dmodol kwangyey mi qpahon tnpqcorox mi qpahon tnprmiwaw, pkrana poman smmalo qori nongyey cico soso, kndodol pskbiyax qori ppdayaw cingmaw koka. Kngkawas 2009 ckcka koka Oricoyya nngalan kana hbangan o 18.7 oko pila Amirika, knrana kana kngkawas o 3.6%. Wada mrana ka kwangyey cocan kayhwa, kngkawas 2011 idas 3, Oricoyya mi Kanada mnsopo psomo kayhwa torima knbeyhing kana knlangan babaw dxral ka king mi dong mi sin mi ging prmaxan kwangpi bnaqi king kwang tocan, tongkwang hoseyncang o wada mndongos mnhdo smalo kngkawas 2013 idas 6, prading mangal tongkwang. Seyho Oricoyya o mbiyax bay dmodol dmayaw pkrana tnoalang mpqpah pnwalang, snblayaq qmlahang tbrinah tnpheytay, pkmalo qori kyoyiko mi spqita mnarox, pkrana smmalo cico, so lmotoc knbaka nanaq keyjay syakay ka Oricoyya. Mccbo Isopiya tnoayos o, mnoda beyhing bay kntkoran na qori keyjay ka Oricoyya, kngkawas 1999 knrana GDP o wada mlih ini kndhoq 1%, dhoq kngkawas 2000 o wada beytaq mrana knsbokoy 8.2%. Mccbo pa wada song ka pila dha Oricoyya, beytaq 6 oo pila Amirika. Poso bay kongyako o niqan hwangco, coko, noco capin cyakong, cinso cyakong, ggomo copin cyakong, jayryaw ssalo sapah. Kngkawas 2010 kana hbangan nngalan kongyako o 2.263 oo pila amirika, kana koka o niqan ciyey knbeyhing knckcka o 255 sapah, qori so ooqon mi mmahon ciyey o 89 sapah, hwangco, qqraqil, lokos ciyey o 34 sapah, smalo patas, iyingsaco 13 sapah, hwakong, pingki, ssmalo iyo o 24 sapah, oxay xxiloy qqiya ssalo sapah o 34 sapah, xxiloy cyakong o 18 sapah, cyacyorey qpahon o 31 sapah. Kisya: Hana balay elo kisya Oricoyya pa wana bay 306 kongri han, kndadax Asomara prading, tonarac o mqori Masawa, toiril o dhoq Akotato, wada sliqon mniq mccbo cida, kiya ka wada plixon ini sdowi da. Kngkawas 1994 ka mniq Masawa wada smlon 5 kongri, prading tmalang dongan. Ppaon elo qsiya: Oricoyya pa niqan Masawa mi Asapo ddha beyhing trndo aso. Masawa o niqan 9 sanan trdo aso, pndkanan kngkawas twentoryang o 1.6 knbkiyan hwokoy, 83.5 knbkiyan hwoo, malo msopo smko 2500 hwokoy, 12 knbkiyan twen hwoo. Asapo kang o niqan 12 sanan trdo aso, malo skowan 28116 hwokoy, 36 knbkiyan twen hwoo. Kngkawas 1992 dhoq kngkawas 1996 iyax niyi o, Asapo kang pndkanan kngkawas twentoryang o 2.5 knbkiyan hwokoy, 203.9 knbkiyan twen hwoo. Nbabaw mccbo tnoayos Isopiya daw, wada "mnhoqil trndowan aso" ka Asapo, kawas kawas o wada song 4000 knbkiyan pila amirika. Masawa hwoyon ryang ka kndodol mrana. Seyho Oricoyya o toco 6.6 oo naykohwa plbangon smmalo ka Masawa trdowan aso, wada mnhdo smalo kngkawas 2002. Oricoyya o niqan to3 sapah ka hangyon kojyo, niqan 7 ka beyhing hworwen. Ckcka niyi pa Oricoyya hangyon kojyo o niqan 4 hworwen, mqori trdowan aso Sotan mi Ayci mi Cita mi Yeymn mi Kata mi Tansangniya tmalang. Ppaon skoki: Oricoyya saya o niqan Oricoyya hangkong mi Nasayar hangkong ddha nkoka hangkong kojyo, niqan ka Ayci hangkong mi Tekwo Hansa hangkong mi Sotan hangkong mi Yeymn hangkong dspac hangkong kojyo koka icil ka mniq Oricoyya pkrana qqpahon dha. Oricoyya o niqan Asomara mi Asapo mi Masawa t3 ka kwoci cicang, niqan Tahorako mi Kormod ddha elo krotang stalang kwoney cicang mi Tesseney mi Naykohwa mi Mahmimet mi Paronto dspac elo oxay krotang stalang kwoney cicang. Oricoyya saya o niqan rrima ka skoki sapa okoyako, ckcka niyi o toro ka poin, ddha ka kongcong baso.
